verses.verse: Therefore, <S%G5620><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> brothers, <S%G80><s%> beloved <S%G27><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> longed for, <S%G1973><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> joy <S%G5479><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> crown, <S%G4735><s%> so <S%G3779><s%> stand firm <S%G4739><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the Lord, <S%G2962><s%> my beloved. <S%G27><s%>
I exhort <S%G3870><s%> Euodia, <S%G2136><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> I exhort <S%G3870><s%> Syntyche, <S%G846><s%> to <S%G5426><s%> think the same way in <S%G1722><s%> the Lord. <S%G2962><s%>

Yes, <S%G2532><s%> I beg <S%G2065><s%> you <S%G4571><s%> also, <S%G2532><s%> true <S%G1103><s%> yokefellow, <S%G4805><s%> help <S%G4815><s%> these women, <S%G846><s%> for they <S%G3748><s%> labored <S%G4866><s%> with me <S%G3427><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the Good News, <S%G2098><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> Clement <S%G2815><s%> also, <S%G2532><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the rest <S%G3062><s%> of my <S%G3450><s%> fellow workers, <S%G4904><s%> whose <S%G3739><s%> names <S%G3686><s%> are in <S%G1722><s%> the book <S%G976><s%> of life. <S%G2222><s%>
Rejoice <S%G5463><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> always! <S%G3842><s%> Again <S%G3825><s%> I will say, <S%G2046><s%> "Rejoice! <S%G5463><s%>"
Let <S%G1097><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> gentleness <S%G1933><s%> be known <S%G1097><s%> to <S%G444><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> men. <S%G444><s%> The Lord <S%G2962><s%> is at hand. <S%G1451><s%>

In nothing <S%G3367><s%> be anxious, <S%G3309><s%> but <S%G235><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> everything, <S%G3956><s%> by prayer <S%G4335><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> petition <S%G1162><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> thanksgiving, <S%G2169><s%> let <S%G1107><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> requests <S%G155><s%> be made known <S%G1107><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> God. <S%G2316><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> the peace <S%G1515><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> which surpasses <S%G5242><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> understanding, <S%G3563><s%> will guard <S%G5432><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> hearts <S%G2588><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> your <S%G3540><s%> thoughts <S%G5216><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus. <S%G2424><s%>

Finally, <S%G3063><s%> brothers, <S%G80><s%> whatever things <S%G3745><s%> are <S%G2076><s%> true, <S%G227><s%> whatever things <S%G3745><s%> are honorable, <S%G4586><s%> whatever things <S%G3745><s%> are just, <S%G1342><s%> whatever things <S%G3745><s%> are pure, <S%G53><s%> whatever things <S%G3745><s%> are lovely, <S%G4375><s%> whatever things <S%G3745><s%> are of good report; <S%G2163><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> there is any <S%G5100><s%> virtue, <S%G703><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> there is any <S%G5100><s%> praise, <S%G1868><s%> think about <S%G3049><s%> these things. <S%G5023><s%>

The things <S%G5023><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> you <S%G3129><s%> <S%G2532><s%> learned, <S%G3129><s%> <S%G2532><s%> received, <S%G3880><s%> <S%G2532><s%> heard, <S%G191><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> saw <S%G1492><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> me: <S%G1698><s%> do <S%G4238><s%> these things, <S%G2532><s%> and the God <S%G2316><s%> of peace <S%G1515><s%> will be <S%G2071><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> you. <S%G5216><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> I rejoice <S%G5463><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> greatly, <S%G3171><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> now <S%G2235><s%> at length <S%G4218><s%> you have revived <S%G330><s%> your thought <S%G5426><s%> for <S%G5228><s%> me; <S%G1700><s%> in <S%G1909><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> you did indeed <S%G5426><s%> take <S%G2532><s%> thought, <S%G5426><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> you lacked opportunity. <S%G170><s%>

Not <S%G3756><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> I speak <S%G3004><s%> in <S%G1473><s%> respect to lack, <S%G5304><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> have learned <S%G3129><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> whatever <S%G3739><s%> state I am, <S%G1510><s%> to be <S%G1511><s%> content in it. <S%G842><s%>

I know <S%G1492><s%> <S%G2532><s%> how <S%G1492><s%> to be humbled, <S%G5013><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> I know also how <S%G1492><s%> to abound. <S%G1722><s%> In everything <S%G3956><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> all things <S%G3956><s%> I have learned <S%G3453><s%> the secret both <S%G2532><s%> to be filled <S%G5526><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> to be hungry, <S%G3983><s%> both <S%G2532><s%> to abound <S%G4052><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> to be in need. <S%G5302><s%>
I can do <S%G2480><s%> all things <S%G3956><s%> through <S%G1722><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> who <S%G3588><s%> strengthens <S%G1743><s%> me. <S%G3165><s%>
However <S%G4133><s%> you <S%G4160><s%> did <S%G4160><s%> well <S%G2573><s%> that you shared <S%G4790><s%> in <S%G2347><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> affliction. <S%G2347><s%>

You <S%G5210><s%> yourselves also <S%G2532><s%> know, <S%G1492><s%> you <S%G5210><s%> Philippians, <S%G5374><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the beginning <S%G746><s%> of the Good News, <S%G2098><s%> when <S%G3753><s%> I departed <S%G1831><s%> from <S%G575><s%> Macedonia, <S%G3109><s%> no <S%G3762><s%> assembly <S%G1577><s%> shared with <S%G2841><s%> me <S%G3427><s%> in <S%G1519><s%> the matter <S%G3056><s%> of giving <S%G1394><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> receiving <S%G1487><s%> but <S%G3361><s%> you <S%G5210><s%> only. <S%G3441><s%>

For <S%G3754><s%> even <S%G2532><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Thessalonica <S%G2332><s%> you sent <S%G3992><s%> once <S%G2532><s%> <S%G530><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> again <S%G1364><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> my <S%G3427><s%> need. <S%G5532><s%>

Not <S%G3756><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> I seek <S%G1934><s%> for the gift, <S%G1390><s%> but <S%G235><s%> I seek <S%G1934><s%> for the fruit <S%G2590><s%> that increases <S%G4121><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> account. <S%G3056><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> I have <S%G568><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> things, <S%G2532><s%> and abound. <S%G4052><s%> I am filled, <S%G4137><s%> having received <S%G1209><s%> from <S%G3844><s%> Epaphroditus <S%G1891><s%> the things <S%G3588><s%> that came from <S%G3844><s%> you, <S%G5216><s%> a sweet-smelling <S%G2175><s%> fragrance, <S%G3744><s%> an acceptable <S%G1184><s%> and well-pleasing <S%G2101><s%> sacrifice <S%G2378><s%> to God. <S%G2316><s%>

<S%G1161><s%> My <S%G3450><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> will supply <S%G4137><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> <S%G5216><s%> need <S%G5532><s%> of yours <S%G5216><s%> according to <S%G2596><s%> his <S%G846><s%> riches <S%G4149><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> glory <S%G1391><s%> in Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus. <S%G2424><s%>
Now <S%G1161><s%> to our <S%G2257><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> be the glory <S%G1391><s%> <S%G1519><s%> forever <S%G165><s%> and ever! <S%G165><s%> Amen. <S%G281><s%>

Greet <S%G782><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> saint <S%G40><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus. <S%G2424><s%> The brothers who are <S%G80><s%> with <S%G4862><s%> me <S%G1698><s%> greet <S%G782><s%> you. <S%G5209><s%>

All <S%G3956><s%> the saints <S%G40><s%> greet <S%G782><s%> you, <S%G5209><s%> especially <S%G3122><s%> <S%G1161><s%> those who are <S%G3588><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> Caesar <S%G2541><s%>'s household. <S%G3614><s%>
The grace <S%G5485><s%> of <S%G2962><s%> the <S%G2257><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> be with <S%G3326><s%> you <S%G5216><s%> all. <S%G3956><s%> Amen. <S%G1891><s%>
